channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 1/8/2026 # New Features & Improvements # AI agent Upgrade: Significantly improved response quality and readability. Seasalt AI agent now delivers more ChatGPT-like answers with clear structure, including headings, lists, and well-organized explanations. 12/30/2025 # New Features & Improvements # Enhanced Monthly Voice Bot Usage Report Excel format: Added “Company Name”, “Branch Name”, and “Uniq ID” columns. Updated Period display format to YYYY/MM/dd - YYYY/MM/dd Applied professional styling (header/totals emphasis and aligned total labels) 12/17/2025 # New Features & Improvements # Improved conversation scrolling: when loading older messages, the viewport stays anchored instead of jumping.
